title: The Seven Thrones: Book One of the Epta Chronicles
description: Lydia Petersen, in her debut novel, weaves a delightful story of mystery, magic, betrayal, and loyalty as she tells the tale of the kingdom of Epta and the young heroes charged with its rule.Lady Athelia is thrust into a world of responsibility and intrigue as she is chosen by the Council to serve as one of the seven rulers of Epta. Embarking on a quest to save the life of one of her subjects, she must learn who among her new companions can be trusted and who among her old friends will remain loyal. Will they discover the traitor in time? Will the young rulers have the wisdom to be the defenders of Epta? Who among them will survive?
author: Lydia Petersen
